lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.’s investigation of possible “diploma mills” no longer includes Oak Hill Academy and Fork Union Military Academy. After visiting the two campuses in Virginia, N.C.A.A. officials determined that the schools’ grades and course work would continue to be used in determining athletic eligibility for students moving on to college.
